column4: i'm playing with grub install problem on AMD64 :(  I don't understand why installer freeze, and under the console and after a chroot grub-install works ?!
lets go on here,  because it belongs rather in this channel .... can you hit ctrl-alt-f3 to see if there are errors in the last lines ?
grub is already the newest version
hmm, looks not like an error......
no and under Alt-F4 no error
i'm not sure which exactly is the error console....try f2 - f4 there should be a lot of msgs in one of them
hmm..... at least there should be a list of the commands that were run....
what is the error you get i the installer screen ? hao long did you give grub to finish (how long did you wait ?)
heh, what is too much for you ?
hmm, but the rest of the install went fine ?
after the reboot, keyboard and locales are not configured
that is normally the first thing run after the first reboot.....
....it does the second part of the install
